content:
TITLE: Running Pluto in Julia REPL
DESCRIPTION: Commands to import Pluto and start the Pluto notebook server from the Julia REPL. This will open Pluto in the default web browser.
SOURCE: https://github.com/fonsp/pluto.jl/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: julia
CODE:
```
julia> import Pluto
julia> Pluto.run()
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Pluto Package in Julia
DESCRIPTION: Instructions for installing the Pluto package using Julia's package manager. This snippet shows how to enter the package manager mode and add Pluto.
SOURCE: https://github.com/fonsp/pluto.jl/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: julia
CODE:
```
julia> ]
(v1.10) pkg> add Pluto
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Executing Pluto.jl End-to-End Tests
DESCRIPTION: Runs the end-to-end tests for Pluto.jl using npm. The PLUTO_PORT environment variable specifies the port on which the Pluto server is running.
SOURCE: https://github.com/fonsp/pluto.jl/blob/main/test/frontend/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
PLUTO_PORT=2345 npm run test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Required Packages for Pluto.jl Testing
DESCRIPTION: Installs necessary npm packages for running Pluto.jl end-to-end tests. This command should be executed in the 'test/frontend' directory of the Pluto.jl project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/fonsp/pluto.jl/blob/main/test/frontend/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Pluto.jl Server for Testing (Project-Specific)
DESCRIPTION: Starts the Pluto.jl server on port 2345 for testing purposes. This command uses a specific project path and disables browser launch and secret access requirement.
SOURCE: https://github.com/fonsp/pluto.jl/blob/main/test/frontend/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
PLUTO_PORT=2345; julia --project=/path/to/PlutoDev -e "import Pluto; Pluto.run(port=$PLUTO_PORT, require_secret_for_access=false, launch_browser=false)"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Pluto.jl Server for Testing (Global Environment)
DESCRIPTION: Starts the Pluto.jl server on port 2345 for testing purposes when Pluto is developed in the global Julia environment. It disables browser launch and secret access requirement.
SOURCE: https://github.com/fonsp/pluto.jl/blob/main/test/frontend/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
PLUTO_PORT=2345; julia -e "import Pluto; Pluto.run(port=$PLUTO_PORT, require_secret_for_access=false, launch_browser=false)"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Specific Pluto.jl Test Suite
DESCRIPTION: Executes a specific test suite for Pluto.jl. The -t flag allows specifying the name of the test suite to run, in this case 'PlutoAutocomplete'.
SOURCE: https://github.com/fonsp/pluto.jl/blob/main/test/frontend/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
clear && HEADLESS=false PLUTO_PORT=1234 npm run test -- -t=PlutoAutocomplete
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Pluto.jl Tests with Browser Visibility
DESCRIPTION: Executes Pluto.jl tests with the browser visible for debugging. The HEADLESS=false flag enables browser visibility, and the command clears the console before running.
SOURCE: https://github.com/fonsp/pluto.jl/blob/main/test/frontend/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
clear && HEADLESS=false PLUTO_PORT=1234 npm run test
```
